P1:
Date: October 9 (Tuesday) 
Time: 7:00am-8:00am
Location: Hotel Manaíra - VIP room

Join us for the WIE Breakfast, where our speakers are prominent women in power electronics and engineering. Over breakfast, we listen to a dynamic woman speaker share her career challenges and triumphs and invite discussion on relevant topics. The WIE Luncheon is open to all who support our efforts in providing mentorship to women in engineering and is free of charge. This event is sponsored by PELS.

The spots are limited. Sign up here:
P2:
Title: Engineering, where women dare.

Speaker: Dr. Jussara Farias Fardin

Bio: Jussara Farias Fardin was born in Itapina, Brazil. She has graduation in Electrical Engineering from the Federal University of Espírito Santo (1978), MSc in Electrical Engineering from the Pontifical Catholic University of Rio de Janeiro (1983) and Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering from the State University of Campinas (2001). She is with the Department of Electrical Engineering at Federal University of Espírito Santo since 1979, where currently is full professor. She develops works on micro-grids, smart grids and identification systems.
